OOC: Before I post, I have a question: Does Hydras' current base have
external weaponry, and is it responding to the threat that Malice is
bringing?

Also Myrmidon did call into the base telling Hydras to get out there if
he still wanted to capture or talk to the intruder. I am not sure if
Perceptor or Dark Rodimus were near enough to catch that, but possibly?


Malice, is the image of Megatron X still being displayed? I wasn't sure
if you dropped it or something?


Preston
